sentences.english: These vaccines protect you from getting infected with mumps.
sentences.chinese: 这些疫苗能够保护你免受腮腺炎感染。

sentences.english: A third BCC is seen in the posterior cervical space.
sentences.chinese: 第三腮腺囊肿位于颈后间隙。

sentences.english: The author used smear from Stensen, s duct aspiration to observe exfoliated cytology in order to help diagnosis of early mumps.
sentences.chinese: 作者应用腮腺导管内吸液涂片观察脱落细胞情况。

sentences.english: The blood amylase is usually elevated as a result of parotitis.
sentences.chinese: 腮腺炎常引起血清淀粉酶增高。

sentences.english: Your baby is also less likely to catch mumps in their first year.
sentences.chinese: 你的婴儿在一岁以内还很少可能感染腮腺炎。

sentences.english: Parotidectomy with retaining facial nerve was done in treating benign tumor.
sentences.chinese: 对良性肿瘤采用保留面神经腮腺肿块全切。

sentences.english: The parotid gland undergoing partial parotidectomy does have the ability of regeneration.
sentences.chinese: 行部分腺体切除术后的腮腺确有再生的能力。

sentences.english: This is more common if you get the disease as an adult.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是在成年感染腮腺炎，这是很常见的。

sentences.english: But now there is no mumps at all in some countries because of vaccination.
sentences.chinese: 但现在因为接种疫苗在某些国家腮腺炎已经不见。

sentences.english: Other causes of parotid swelling are suppurative parotitis .
sentences.chinese: 腮腺肿胀的其它原因是化脓性腮腺炎。

sentences.english: Other causes of parotid swelling are suppurative parotitis .
sentences.chinese: 腮腺肿胀的其它原因是化脓性腮腺炎。

sentences.english: Methods 126 cases with ablating parotid glands were retrospectively analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 方法对126例腮腺切除术病例进行回顾性分析。

sentences.english: American bacteriologist who researched antibodies for the mumps virus.
sentences.chinese: 美国细菌学家，研究腮腺炎病毒的抗体。

sentences.english: Crepitus and air bubbles at Stensen's duct with palpation may be observed at physical examination.
sentences.chinese: 体格检查时可以触及捻发音和腮腺导管内气泡。

sentences.english: Objective To further improve the recognition of image manifestation in the parotid disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的进一步提高对腮腺病变影像表现的认识。

definition: pleural cavity (part of thorax containing lungs)
